s1.name: JORAM License
s1.p: JORAM is a free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL) as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2.1 of the license, or (at your option) any later version.

s1.name: Other Licenses
s1.p: The JORAM distribution includes libraries of external softwares.
The Regexp regular expression parser, the SOAP implementation, and the Xerces XML parser are Apache's projects covered by the Apache license.

The JavaCup Java parser generator is covered by the
CUP Parser Generator Copyright Notice, License, and Disclaimer.
